comment.body:
As requested I disabled the filters one by one and checked Amazon each time with no change.  Adguard is still deactivated to be used.
________________________________
From: jellizaveta ***@***.***>
Sent: Monday, August 14, 2023 02:52
To: AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters ***@***.***>
Cc: prattmp ***@***.***>; Mention ***@***.***>
Subject: Re: [AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters] www.amazon.com (Issue #157776)


Please try disabling filters one by one and check which filter is causing the issue

—
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub<https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/157776#issuecomment-1676937666>, or unsubscribe<https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/BBTTQJV46WOQ3YSKKQDVG53XVHRMZANCNFSM6AAAAAA25NZVB4>.
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.Message ID: ***@***.***>

issue.title: gall.dcinside.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://gall.dcinside.com/mgallery/board/lists?id=genrenovel](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgall.dcinside.com%2Fmgallery%2Fboard%2Flists%3Fid%3Dgenrenovel) ### Comment Username: @115dkk > 1. I have the same problem with all galleries (bulletin boards) on a site called dcinside. The gallery I specified in the link is just one example. > > 2. intermittently, when I try to access, refresh, enter a post/comment, etc., it just loads pointlessly and never completes, as if the browser is lagging. > > 3. In that state, I can't select any links, try to refresh again, or even hit back button to go back until I get to the new tab home. > > 4. like 'namu wiki', I have a suspicion that the company is intentionally making the site difficult to use if you have adblock enabled. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/npk3eowo1hws8880kw84k4oosw40wo0btj3rewqkjc.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/iw5zdzox51k4kgkwco0wwo0g4040k8o5umb8xhphjc.png?nc=1)

comment.body: AdGuard DNS 서버를 안 쓰셔도 DNS 필터는 쓰실 수 있습니다만, DNS 보호가 아닌 DNS 필터링이 활성화되면 오류가 있는 경우가 있어서 Android에서는 꺼두는 것을 추천드립니다.

issue.body:

comment.body: 고맙습니다. dns 필터를 껐더니 잘 됩니다. 주소를 또 바꾸긴 했지만요. 그쪽에서도 계속 대응을 하는 것 같습니다. 별개로 adguard dns 서버를 쓰지 않으면 굳이 dns 필터를 쓰지 않아도 될 것 같은데요(현재 클라우드플레어). 앞으로도 계속 꺼놓을까요? 고맙습니다.
